results.title: Potential of Combination Pharmacotherapy in Patients with Arterial Hypertension and Prediabetes: Focus on Organ Protection.
results.text_hl: Aim    To compare the effects of two combined antihypertensive therapies on indices of the structural and functional state of the left ventricular (LV) myocardium and intrarenal vascular resistance in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@) and @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@.Material and methods    The study included 80 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with poorly controlled @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@AH@@@ and @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ who were randomized into two groups: @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in group 1 (n=40) received @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@ at a starting dose of 5 mg/day, sustained-release @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ 1.5 mg/day, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 1000 mg/day; @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in group 2 (n=40) received @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@ 5 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_moxonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C043482 @@@moxonidine@@@ at a starting dose of 0.2 mg/day, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 1000 mg/day.
